message:
Holy s#!t!!!
I was just enjoying the ep when VOLTRON make a f**king cameo!
Totally cool!

This ep kinda hurt my brain...
How the heck Megumi can Unlimited burst despite being new to the game? Or
Was she an ex player who got her app uninstalled?
If she is an ex player then how the heck the app got installed to her even if it's temporary?
So many questions yet no answers...

Â¬she's an old player and lost her memories and its because of the program/bug of the game (remember aqua current uses her power to silver to lost his memories just reference) but its dew to the program even the others lost there memories and the white legion is helping them, shes a former member of white legionits confusing bc im trying to connect the importation but wish ya understand it abit anyways to next ep
